speaker: Tutor
dialogue: All right. Do you see the tools on the left-hand side of the screen?

speaker: Tutor
dialogue: All right. We're going to take a look at those for a minute and practice with a few of them because the erase button gets a little bit tricky, so we want to make sure that we can see all of your work, okay?
